website_summaries.verdict: A great-looking chair that offers lots of support and is easy to clean, which can be a real plus for those with kids or pets.
pros: Stands out for being easy to clean
A larger seat with a lot of support
Assembles in under half an hour
cons: Sits a bit high and some may find it too firm
Some buyers complain that the fabric along the arms and cushion starts to peel after a few months

website_summaries.verdict: Stylish option that won't break the bank. Fantastic value for money.
pros: We love this chair’s impressive appearance and affordable price
easily passes for a high-end chair
Roomy enough for any body type or sitting style
Built to last with heavy-duty wood legs and frame
Spring foundation and generous high density foam cushioning offer supportive comfort
cons: Firm at first and may need some breaking in before reaching its full comfort potential

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chair for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Very classy chair with a great price! The chair is very easy to assemble and is comfortable for relaxing in. I recommend the matching ottoman for this chair, too.
customer_reviews.author: LSK

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice chair, although the packing could have been better ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice chair, although the packing could have been better and there were a few other concerns. Amazon and the Seller made it worth the purchase. Its firm, but overtime it will become more comfortable. A great Buy! Expensive Look.
customer_reviews.author: agirl

customer_reviews.title: The chair is not a welcoming chair to sit in ...
customer_reviews.text: The chair is not a welcoming chair to sit in, at least not in the first month I've had it. The seat cushion and the back cushion are quite a bit too firm for my liking. The chair seems to assert itself rather than to welcome. I'm hoping the cushions will soften with time. Also the faux leather has that slick, shiny look and feel. I've rubbed it with distilled vinegar. Helped a bit.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Chairs are not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The back part of the chairs are leaning back to far, they need to be in a more upright position. I had to buy pillows for better back support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice chair for the price. The seat is a little high and stiff, but is becoming more confortable as time goes on. Overall, very happy with my purchase and it arrived quickly. The only reason I gave it a four star was because the packaging was flimsy and the vinly fabric on the bottom corner was scuffed off. It's not that noticeable, but if it was packaged better that probably would not have happened.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann Carini

customer_reviews.title: Great looking chair in a room of matching leather furniture
customer_reviews.text: Great looking chair in a room of matching leather furniture. Get the matching foot rest and it's great for watching TV or reading.
customer_reviews.author: Howard stockett

customer_reviews.title: It's a great chair at a good buy
customer_reviews.text: It's a great chair at a good buy. It sits up a little higher and fits my big friends comfortably. No one can tell it isn't leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just wipes clean and sturdy.. holds over 200 pounds easily
customer_reviews.text: Cute chair,little but holds up well..just wipes clean and sturdy..holds over 200 pounds easily!
customer_reviews.author: cute game...

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair, very elegant and easy to assemble (less than 30 minutes ) and comfortable. I bought two :)
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Miller

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: These look great and are pretty well made. The only reason I didn't do 5 stars is because it does kind of feel like you're sitting on a piece of foam when you sit down...which sucks but it's still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love 💕 my chairs. I received them today and they are beautiful in love! They look amazing by my bay window
customer_reviews.author: margaret

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good chair but
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good chair but, the cushion actually sets as high as the arms, not down in the chair as shown in picture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and look great
customer_reviews.text: Arrived one week early that expected. Easy to put together and look great!
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our home office
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our home office. Very comfortable and looks great. Was able to find a matching ottoman locally.
customer_reviews.author: Student of the Game

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is sturdy, comfortable, and easy to assemble. Firm support, and it looks really nice. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Laura schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Not real comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, not soft at all. I expected it to be more comfortable but for a small area it works.
customer_reviews.author: stella squires

customer_reviews.title: But for the price its a great chair if its not something you sit in a ...
customer_reviews.text: Padding on the arms is a bit thin. You can feel the arms thru the material. But for the price its a great chair if its not something you sit in a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and they are extremely comfortable. They also look great! It was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla George

customer_reviews.title: A Good Value
customer_reviews.text: A very good item for the price. I would recommend it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Wyller

customer_reviews.title: It is a OK chair, but I would puchase ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a OK chair, but I would puchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M Meitz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Not a problem with any part of this chair. Comfortable and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: mary carnahan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Very nice chairs! I bought two! Nothing luxurious or fancy but very comfortable and classy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Color not as shown in photo
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the color. Not as shown in the photo. It was almost black. Very well made chair though.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfortable and looks more expensive
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely buy it again. It is very comfortable and looks more expensive. Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Ricart

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Chair holds up but could be studrier. Hard to get legs on chair
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together and looks more expensive than It was ...
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dartez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is fantastic, great accent in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J Applegate

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE CHAIRS!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE LOOK! Bought 2 for a large guest room and seem very well made. Very little assembly. The only drawback for me is that they are extremely firm (not something you'd sit in for long periods). Still, 5 stars for look and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: so best for people with long legs
customer_reviews.text: I could move the back forward and backward about 4 inches - it was clear that the brackets were loose inside. I cut out the bottom and saw some of the bolts were were badly stripped and loose. I removed and replaced those and added a few wood screws. I also had to move the location of the Velcro strip in the back (removed staples and re-stapled). Now it functions well. Sits very deep, so best for people with long legs.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Comfortable, disabled client's can get up and down with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyal Kennedy Counseling

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for the money but the foam in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Good chair for the money but the foam in the seat cushion is very firm. It is not particularly uncomfortable other than it makes you sit too high relative to the arms. I expect I will try and find some softer foam to replace the foam that came in it.
customer_reviews.author: David Crichlow

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in my office, but foam cushion is very stiff and not as comfortable as I had hoped. Hoping it gets more comfortable as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Cheves A Whitfield

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these chairs from another site but after it arrived I was so happy bought another from Amazon. The chair is very easy to assemble took me 15 mins maybe less and its extremely sturdy. The size is great for my living room not huge like some chairs tend to be but neither is it too small. For the price it looks way more expensive you will not be disappointed. My older husband will no longer have to climb out of our old chair this is comfortable makes a great reading chair.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money and added bonus is they ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these chairs 6 years ago for business where people sit in them 24/7. Some of the employees sitting in the chair for 12 hours weigh over 350 lbs. This chair has lasted longer than any other chair that I have ever bought in the past 18 years for this business. The material on the arms have now begun to crack and peel and springs have finally broke so ordering 2 more chairs. Great value for the money and added bonus is they look good! I would purchase for a home they look that great!!!.
customer_reviews.author: thomas doty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price. They look great. We'll see how they wear....
customer_reviews.author: vanessa vanegas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Chair the back is to far to reach Poorly made chair
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Lewis

product_meta.title: Dorel Living Elegant Faux Leather Club Chair
product_meta.description: Color:BrownSit back and relax in this elegant faux leather club chair by Dorel Asia. This sturdy chair is built to last with solid wood feet, a sinuous spring foundation and durable upholstery that looks and feels just like real leather. It's sure to make a great addition to any room in your home. The high-density foam cushion provides firm support for your body while seated and the rich brown color will match well to your living room decor.
feature_bullets: Faux leather upholstery looks and feels just like the real thing
High-density foam cushion provides firm, comfortable support
Club chair has a sinuous spring foundation
Sturdy wood frame for extra durability
Solid wood feet help keep the club chair stable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars47 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
